text: The Long Walk is a 2019 Laotian drama film directed by Mattie Do. It premiered in the Giornate degli Autori section of the 76th Venice International Film Festival. It also screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2019 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Yannawoutthi Chanthalungsy as The Old Man * Vilouna Phetmany as Lina * Por Silatsa as The Boy * Noutnapha Soydara as The Girl * Chanthamone Inoudome as The Mother * Brandon Hashimoto as Kenji ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 films Category:2019 drama films Category:Laotian films Category:Lao-language films Category:Films directed by Mattie Do
title: The Long Walk (film)
